mapper.sql: activity_id, items_id, mch_id, activity_name, activity_type, create_time, start_time, end_time, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, reserve4, reserve5
mapper.select: select items_id from epay_activity where mch_id = #{mch_id}
mapper.insert: insert into epay_activity (activity_id, items_id, mch_id, activity_name, activity_type, create_time, start_time, end_time, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, reserve4, reserve5) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
